pages.name: Qi Energy Generation
pages.data:
css
    [!1] +Ichor

pages.name: Ichor
pages.data:
css
    Ichor is an energy-dense, artificial fluid invented as a high-power fuel source.  Ichor is primarily used in large spacecraft, especially in those which make use of [!1 heavy laser weaponry] or large [!2 warp drives].  This is because Ichor can be used to generate a large amount of power in a small amount of time.
    
    Ichor is a compound Consisting of, listed from highest to lowest concentration, Silicon, Oxygen, Iodine, Cesium, Bismuth, and [!3 Aptha].  Ichor typically comes in a fluid form, but can be manufactured as a solid when additional Silicon and small amounts of Carbon are added to the formative mixture.  Ichor's energy density is about 344 kilojoules per gram (which is about 10.489 [!4 chells] per gram), which is the highest out of any known non-nuclear energy source.  It has a density of 6.832 grams per cubic centimeter, a viscosity of 3,520 centipoise (if in liquid form), a hardness close to that of chalk (in in solid form), and a very dark-green coloration.  At standard market value, Ichor sells for $30 [!5 ITC] per kilogram.
    
    Ichor can be burned/oxygenated, but this only releases about 30% of its energy.  Ichor burns violently and at high tempuratures, making open flames near Ichor containers a serious risk for explosions or meltdowns.  Burning Ichor leaves behind "Ichor Ash", a pale, blue-green coarse powder; and "Ichor Soot", a dark, fine powder.  The Ichor Ash contains the remaining 70% of the Ichor's energy, but accessing it is difficult, and melting Ichor Ash back down into Raw Ichor is a hazardous, expensive process, so Ichor Ash is usually Discarded.  Ichor Soot is entirely inert, and can be recycled back into the Ichor production process.�css
    Ichor is produced by heating the constituent materials to about 1,900 degrees, mixing until the material is homogenous, and then cooling it.  In this form, it's called "Raw Ichor".  Raw Ichor is a lime-green, thin fluid, and is mostly inert and slightly flammable.  Raw Ichor is then "baked" in a low-tempurature "oven" with a very high concentration of [!4 Qi-Energy].  Baked Ichor, just called "Ichor", is its useful form, and is a dark-green, thick liquid.  Ichor takes a large amount of energy to be baked.

    Ichor is stable, having a half-life of about 54 [!6 Galactic Years] (at room tempurature).  As Ichor decays, it releases 76.9% of its energy in the form of [!3 charged qi particles], about 0.54% in the form of high-wavelength EM radiation, and the other 22.56% in the form of heat.  Normally, decay does not cause a chain reaction.  However, Ichor's stability decreases dramatically as its tempurature and pressure increases.  At 1,100 degrees celsius or above, Ichor becomes unstable enough that the heat caused by its decay is enough to maintain a self-sustaining decay reaction.  This tempurature is called the "Critical Point".  At or above this point, the tempurature of the decaying ichor must be regulated, otherwise a meltdown is imminent.  As Ichor reacts and decays, it turns into 83% Ichor Soot, 15% Ichor Ash, and 2% Raw Ichor by mass.  These biproducts are usually discarded, but are sometimes sold back to Ichor manufacturers to be refined and recycled back into Ichor.�css
    Ichor is used in Ichor Reactors to produce an immense amount of energy in a small amount of time.  A small Ichor Reactor, taking up usually appoximately 4 cubic meters, is able to produce up to 6 megawatts, while a large Ichor Reactor, fitting in up to 30 cubic meters, can produce 400 megawatts of power.  Ichor Reactors generate energy by placing a small amount of Ichor in a small, hardened, qi-conductive, pressure-resistant chamber.  This chamber is then heated up to cause the Ichor to decay.  As the Ichor decays and gives off Qi Energy, that Qi Energy is picked up by the chamber walls and can then be used.  The waste heat produced by the reactor chamber can also be used to boil water and spin turbines to generate [!7 electrical energy], similar to traditional power generators.  Standard Ichor reactors take 40 to 70 seconds to heat up the reactor chamber to approprate tempuratures.
    There are two kinds of Ichor Reactor, "Cold Ichor Reactors" and "Hot Ichor Reactors".  "Cold" Ichor Reactors keep the tempurature of the Ichor in the reactor chamber high, but under the Critical Point.  While this produces less power per gram of Ichor per second, the risk of meltdown is very low, and the reactor only requires a moderate amount of cooling.  "Hot" Ichor Reactors, however, heat the Ichor in the reactor chamber beyond the critical point, which kicks off the dangerous, but highly-efficient chain reaction.  Since the Ichor in a Hot Ichor Reactor chamber is beyond its critical point, it will continue to get hotter and hotter as it releases more and more energy, meaning that Hot Ichor Reactors must actively cool the chamber to keep the tempurature of the reacting Ichor from surpassing that of the melting point of the Chamber's material.�css
    Many Modern Hot Ichor Reactors are able to detect an imminent meltdown, and are built to automatically jettison the contents of the reactor chamber once the Ichor inside reaches a certain tempurature.  Usually, the reactor chamber opens a value to a pipe which leads outside of the structure housing the reactor.  As the Ichor is vented, its pressure sharply decreases to the ambient pressure of the environment, which quickly decreases its tempurature.  After this, the jettisoned Ichor will either continue to react in open air (or space), or have been cooled down enough by the pressure change to dip below the critical point and stop the chain reaction.
    
    Ichor was originally invented in 36 P.W. on the planet [!8 Bius Tu] as a high-density fuel source.  The full name of Ichor is "Ichor-38", as the modern mixture of Ichor was the 38th draft of the formula made by the Tuine science team that invented it.  Because of this, for abbreviation, Ichor is sometimes referred to as just "38".

pages.name: Artificial Intelligence
pages.data:
css
    [!1] +Coefficient Node Matrixes

pages.name: Antaria
pages.data:
css
┌────────────────────────────────────┐
│Population............: 1.12M       │
│City Limits Area......: 2827km^2    │
│Year Founded..........: 102         │
│Gross Domestic Product: $324B       │
│Demonym...............: Antarian    │
└────────────────────────────────────┘

    Antaria, the capital of Kayan, it is a planned city founded in 92 by the planetary governor in honor of the tenth anniversary of Urran Coup by [!1 Karmine Jacobs].  Both domestically, and abroad, it is one of the poster children of Urran Brutalism; a minimalist architectural style where the building materials and structural elements of the buildings are left bare.  As such, the city makes heavy use of concrete, glass and timber in its structures.

    The city is organised in concentric circles, the largest being 30km in diameter, with a 1km arcology at the center, housing the administrative district of the planet.  This Arcology is made from steel-reinforced concrete, with a wooden spire constructed on top.  It has a volume of 531,000 cubic meters and is a hive of administrative activity, with thousands of workers coming every day to the tower.  The skyline of the city forms forms a bell shape when seen from afar, with the administrative center in the middle, and buildings getting progressively smaller as they get further from the city center.�css
    A [!2 skyrail] system link the center to the periphery in a cross pattern and six circles around the center.  But these skyrails have failed commercially due to the high cost of the tickets and expensive maintenance, which was exacerbated by the low population.  The denizens of Antaria mostly use the roads, by car, bus, bike, or just on foot.
    
    The city was originally planned to house 6 million inhabitants, but most Kayanites found the "raw" look of the city unappealing, leading to a cascading effect where the low appeal of the city would cause a lowered population, which, in turn, would have a harder time supporting the large number of commercial services present in the city, which would further lower the appeal of Antaria even more.
    Today, the city is disproportionately inhabited by government officials managing the planet and [!3 Neo-Urran] state programs; large sections of the city are left uninhabited for years at a time, as residents tend to bunch together.

pages.name: Kayan
pages.data:
css
┌──────────────────────────┐
│Radius.........: 4,271km  │
│Atm. Rating....: A        │
│Atm. Height....: 151km    │
│Atm. Pressure..: 0.9 atm  │
│Surf. Gravity..: 0.71G    │
│Hydrosphere....: Water,78%│
│Precipitation..: 325cm/y  │
│Obliquity......: 1.15°    │
│Average Temp...: 312K     │
│Rotation Period: 23Hrs    │
│Orbital Period.: 0.78Yr   │
│Population.....: 12.4B    │
│Majority Race..: Tyvent   │
│Allegiance.....: Neo-Urra │
└──────────────────────────┘

    Kayan, formerly "Nastimye", is a hot and humid planet in the Celesse system.  As the Homeworld of the [!1 Tyvant race], it had been colonised and civilized since ancient times, and was the capital world of [!2 Tyventia] until this status was transferred to [!3 Quaen] in 82.  The Planet does not experience differing seasons due to its very low Obliquity.  The planet’s land mass is divided into six major continents which represent 19% of the surface area of the planet.  An additional 3% of the surface consists of small islands and scattered landmasses, meaning a total 22% of the planet`s surface is land, with the other 78% being water.
    
    Due to the absence of seasons and weak marine currents, the temperature across the planet is mostly constant, which the average temperature of any point on the surface being almost entirely determined by its latitude; most of the landmasses near the equator are desert or savannah, while extreme (near-polar) latitudes are tundras and ice deserts.  One peculiarity of the planet is its coastlines -- while most its coasts are irregular, some other parts form a warped yet quasi-perfect arc.  Simulations of the continental drift have led to the theory that all of the landmasses of kayan were arranged in an almost-perfect circle two supercontinents ago.�css
    The planet is densely-populated due to being a homeworld for the [!1 Tyvant species], and is at the center of the trade routes in the Tyventian sector.  It was for this very reason that after the loss of Urra, the Neo Urran empire has chosen Nastimye as its new capital, this was at this time that The name was changed, in order to help the transition, from its old tyventian identity to its new Neo Urran one.     The planet has a thriving mining industry due to abundant concentrations of iron oxide, titanium, gold, aphta, aluminium and other ores in a geological layer dating from approximately 620 million year ago, which is present almost everywhere on the planet.

    Under Tyventan rule, Nastimye was the capital of the very-centralised Tyventian empire, and as such hosted a vibrant economy.  The heavy concentration of useful materials in the planet's soil helped fuel the expansion of the empire, which, was the largest single nation in the [!4 Silver Stream] by territory (number of planets).  After the invasion of 82, the planet was the economic barycenter of the [!5 Urran Empire] due to the amount of infrastructure already in place.  After 5 years of recession caused by the annexation, the planetary economy restarted its growth.  And finally, after the Battle of Armalai and the empire's loss of [!6 Planetary Urra], the planet became the capital of an empire again and large efforts have been undertaken to get the administrative infrastructures of the planet to work as a capitol again.

pages.name: Mining Companies
pages.data:

    [!1] +Kastrataco

pages.name: Kayanese Strata Company
pages.data:
css
┌───────────────────────────┐
│Active Period.: 84-Present │
│Field.........: Mining     │
│Open Stocks?..: No         │
│Base..........: [!1 Kayan] │
│Net Worth.....: $5 Trillion│
└───────────────────────────┘

    The Kayanese Strata Company, shortened to "Kastrataco", is a mining corporation charged by the [!2 Imperial Urran] (later Neo Urran) government with the extraction and export of the Kayanese ore from underground.  Its main sectors of activity are Gold, Titanium, Iron, Aluminium, and small amounts of Natural Aptha.

    The company owns numerous mining facilities all over Kayan, and makes a sizable profit on exports from them, all of which being located in a 1-meter thick geological layer, present across almost all land on the planet.  When a mining site is expended, the company restores the site for other use (such as residential or commercial developments) and sells it to help fund purchasing new zones to mine in elsewhere on the surface.

    Kastrataco was incorporated shortly after the conquest of [!1 Kayan] by the [!2 Urran Empire] in order to control the valuable market of Kayanese mining products.  Kastrataco was originally formed in 84 as a conglomerate of all Kayanese mining companies, forcibly nationalized by the occupying Urran Empire.  Despite being a company, Kastrataco is owned by the local Neo-Urran government, which receives dividends from the mining activities.  After the Urran Empire dissolved, Neo-Urra was more than happy to keep the deal with Kastrataco in place, and the company continued its operations unimpeded.

pages.name: Media Companies
pages.data:
css
    [!1] +Urran Broadcasting Corporation

pages.name: Urran Broadcasting Corporation
pages.data:
css
┌─────────────────────────────┐
│Active Period.: 82-Present   │
│Field.........: Media        │
│Open Stocks?..: No           │
│Base..........: [!1 Neo-Urra]│
│Net Worth.....: $12 Billion  │
└─────────────────────────────┘

    The Urran Broadcasting Corporation (UBC) is a media group founded in 82, weeks after the coup of [!2 Karmine Jacobs]. At this time, it was the main tool used by the regime to distribute its propaganda.  The group currently own several radio stations and two television channels.  These television channels are Urra One, available across the broader [!3 GCP] for free; and Urra Two (previously "Urra Four"), a channel available across [!1 Neo-Urran] worlds.  On Urra Two, roughly 1/3 of daily content is for and about the planet where it is aired, while the rest is broader national, or galactic news.  While being intentionally made available to the rest of the GCP, UBC programming is banned in many jurisdictions, including [!4 Deoria], [!5 Bius Tu], and [!6 Gallea].
    
    An Urra Two station was present on Itascan-Controlled Planetary Urra at two different instances.  Each time, the station was destroyed by civilian activists, with the first being the wood-frame Urra Two station being burnt down in 102, and the second being knocked down by a civilian bulldozer truck in 106.  In both of these instances, there were no fatalities, and the civilian activists were not prosecuted beyond disorderly conduct charges.�css
    During the [!2 Jacob] years, the title of CEO of the UBC was a very prestigious one, due to the importance of propaganda in the [!1 Urran Empire], and most CEOs of the group either had been or were going to be Urran Ministers of Information.

    The group peaked in 102, just before the [!7 battle of Armalai], being the only TV group in the Empire and owning five channels.  But, after the disappearance of [!2 Karmine Jacobs] and the secession of [!8 New Tyventia], the UBC had entered a slow decline, only drawing a significant audience in [!1 Neo Urra] and even there having lost the monopoly. Two years after the Battle, The UBC has announced the end of their second, third and fifth television channels because of their dwindling audience.
    The group is allegedly in deep financial trouble according to internal sources, due to the lack of revenue from its channels and the high production value of their content, which was previously subsidised by the government.  The company also has a public relation problem, often being seen as the “voice of the dictatorship” and it is rumored that a rebranding may be on the way.

pages.name: C61 Ballistic Weapon
pages.data:
css
┌─────────────────────────────────────┐
│Use Period.........: 107-Present     │
│Weight.............: 1800Kg          │
│Unit Cost..........: $75,000 [!1 ITC]│
│Caliber............: 300mm           │
│Projectile Velocity: 4km/s           │
│Guided.............: Yes             │
│Explosive Yield....: N/A             │
│Manufacturer.......: [!2 Kinetyx]    │
└─────────────────────────────────────┘

    The C61 Cluster Kinetic Impactor is an ammunition used by the [!3 Neo-Urran] military in the [!4 Type VII chemical cannon].  The ammunition was developed during the post armalai fleet modernization program by Kinetyx as an anti-armor weapon.

    When the ammunition is fired, the target is acquired and the shell starts correcting its trajectory.  When it arrives at a predefined distance from the target, a small charge inside the shell explodes and the 61 tungsten rods separate from the main body and hit the target with dozens of unique entry points, almost guaranteed to hit at least one vital system on the target.  The rods themselves are optimized for penetration, with a length of 50 cm and a diameter of 2 cm, they can penetrate over one meter of steel armor, while most ships only have around 30 cm of protective plating.

    The shell corrects its trajectory using a hybrid-fuel engine using a nitrous oxide oxidizer and a rubber fuel.  With the oxidizer being a liquid and the rubber a solid, this system allows for a higher engine efficiency and finer control than a solid-fuel rocket, while also being cheaper than a liquid-fuel engine.  The expected total burn time is about ten seconds, allowing continuous guidance for targets up to 40 kms away.

    The spread of the rods can be controlled by timing the detonation of the internal charge, the radius of dispersion evolving linearly with the distance to the target when the shell is detonated, which this distance usually being between 1 and 10 kilometers.

pages.name: C61 Type VII Chemical Cannon
pages.data:
css
┌────────────────────────────────────┐
│Use Period........: 107-Present     │
│Weight............: ~500,000Kg      │
│Caliber...........: 300mm           │
│Shots/15 Seconds..: 2               │
│Dispersion at 1km.: 2m (0.1°)       │
│Muzzle Energy.....: 13680MJ         │
│Ammunition........: [!1 C61 Shells] │
│Damage Type.......: Ballistic       │
│Unit Cost.........: $4M [!2 ITC]    │
│Manufacturer......: Kinetyx         │
└────────────────────────────────────┘

    The Type VII Chemical cannon is the main offensive weapon of the [!3 Armalai Model] Neo-Urran corvettes.  It`s optimised for the use of [!1 C61 guided shells]. It uses a mix of methane and liquid oxygen to propel guided shells at 4km/s, but is capable of firing other ammunition of the same make and caliber.
    The barrel is 15 meters long and 30 cm in diameter.  When a shell is to be fired, it is introduced into the barrel and the combustion chamber is filled with methalox behind the shell.  The mixture is then ignited.  When the pressure buildup from the propellant becomes great enough (within less than a second of ignition), soft metal bars on the sides of the shell bend out of the way and the projectile is released.
    The gun is turreted on [!3 Armalai-Model] ships, and can rotate on one axis with a freedom of movement of around 270 degrees, but other configurations are possible, either with the gun integrated into the hull or with added elevation controls.�css
    A gas recuperation system has been implemented in order to complement the stealth of the Armalai model, at the end of the barrel, in order to decrease the muzzle flash, two pipes collect most of the gazes propelling the shell (because they can't exit the barrel until the shell has left), the gases are then chilled by passing through the liquid methane and oxygen tanks before being expelled at the back of the turret
    The cost of the gun alone is estimated at $3 millions [!2 ITC], the modifications needed to house it on a one axis turret add $1 million, and adding an elevation axis would add $2 million to the price.

pages.name: Kinetyx
pages.data:
css
┌────────────────────────────┐
│Active Period.:95-Present   │
│Field.........:Armaments    │
│Open Stocks?..:No           │
│Base..........:[!1 Kosh]    │
│Net Worth.....:$215 Billion │
└────────────────────────────┘


    Kinetyx is a [!2 Neo-Urran] state-owned weapons manufacturer incorporated in 95PW.  Their domain of expertise covers many types of [!3 craft weaponry], from [!4 Ballistic Cannons], to [!5 PDC], to ammunition and missiles.  Kinetyx sells exclusively to the Neo-Urran military, being an asset of the state.  They have produced the armament and munitions equipping the [!6 Kayan], [!7 Armalai] and [!8 Karmine] models of combat spacecraft.

    Being based on [!1 Kosh] allows Kinetyx to employ skilled technicians and engineers.  Due to the industrial culture of the planet, the cost of simpler parts are considerably lower than they would be on other less-developed planets.  Said parts can be bought from specialised companies.  Specialists from these companies are usually employed when special insight is needed.

    Kinetyx was created by the Urran government in 95 in order to produce the guns and missiles of the [!6 Kayan-Model] combat craft.  In the following years, the company had developed a real expertise with cannons and missiles for spacecraft, which have been put to use in the Post-Armalai Fleet modernisation program.  Kinetyx currently has a partnership with [!9 Ganoder], which produce the computer systems for the [!10 C61 guided shell] and the missiles of the Kayan class.

pages.name: Fighter-Class Spacecraft
pages.data:
css
    [!1] +Nero

pages.name: Kayan Corvette
pages.data:
css
┌───────────────────────────────────────────┐
│Use Period...: 93-Present                  │ 
│Class........: Corvette                    │ 
│Market Price.: $209,525,000                │
│Mass.........: 5100 Tons                   │
│Δ-V(Atm|Vac).: N/A|14Km/s                  │
│Seats|Crew...: 6|2-6                       │
│Engine(Fuel).: Ichor Lattice(Mercury)      │
│Power Source.: Ichor Reactor               │
│RCS..........: MMH + N2O4                  │
│SAS..........: Full                        │
│Main Computer: [!1 G-ACU]                  │
│Storage......: 23m^3                       │
└───────────────────────────────────────────┘

    With a length of 23 meters, the Kayan-Class Corvette (also called the Kayan-Model Corvette) is sized similarly to numerous [!2 GCP] fighters, but has a higher level of autonomy, firepower and survivability.  Two variants of the kayan exist, called Type-A and Type-B. the type A was the first to be produced and can be found in both the neo urran and new tyventian navies, it features two cannons, the type B started production in 103 and replaced one cannon with a laser.  Both types feature two [!3 Antaria turrets], fitted with 100mm cannons on the Type A but with one of them being equipped with a 10MW laser on the Type B.  These turrets are complemented by eight 1.3x1.3x4.5m VLS missile tubes. 

    Its compact package is made possible by the use of mercury-based thrusters, which combine a relatively-high ISP of 5000s with a high thrust and a compact fuel.  The two mercury thrusters are positioned orthogonally from one another, allowing for unpredictable evasive maneuvers.  The main thruster can output 150MN of thrust (a 3G burn) while the smaller ventral thruster outputs 75 MN of thrust (1.5G burn).�css
    Life aboard a Kayan is organised in three rotating shifts of 8h. The crew is divided in three pairs of one pilot and one mechanic who perform their work shifts at the same time and sleep at the same time in the two dormitories.  This allows for the continuous operation of the ship and saves volume and weight that would've been taken up by additional cabins, since the two-bed rooms are only occupied by a third of the crew at a time.  The pair system allows for better performance and crew bonding, since the crew members get used to working with their partner.  In case of a crisis (a combat situation, for example), the off-duty and sleeping pairs can be called on in order to help.  And at the end of each shift, the captain (which is one of the pilots) meets the pair ending and the pair starting a shift in order to maintain situational awareness and give orders.

    The ship's defense is divided in several layers in order to maximize survivability; the farthest threats (up to a few hundred light milliseconds away) are dealt with by the laser when equipped, which is sufficiently cooled to function continuously at 10MW.  When targets are a few dozen kilometers from the ship, the 20 self defense missiles become an option, and can be used to destroy other missiles and projectiles or be used as a swarm, overwhelming an enemy’s point defense grid and crippling the ship.  When the range drops below 20 km, the cannon becomes a powerful tool and can be used either offensively or defensively.  The kayan uses two reactive armor pods which can explode into a cloud of debris in order to destroy one or more projectiles which would have slipped through the defensive grid.  It can also divert missiles and radar readings using chaff and flares.�css
    All of the fleet’s point defense assets and information are synchronized in a network in order to increase situational awareness and cover blind spots. The kayan’s radars also have the ability to form an interferometry network in order to increase the range of detection and resolution of the enemy positions.

    The kayan’s passive armor follows an all-or-nothing philosophy: 
        - The whole ship is protected by two layers of Titanium armor -- the outermost layer has a height of 5 cm and is coated in a radar absorbing paint.  Under this first layer, and separated from it by a void of 25 cm, lies a second layer of titanium armor, 45 cm high and made as reflective as possible.  This second layer is designed to stop projectiles from penetrating any part of the ship, but more importantly, to protect against lasers with a sub-X-ray particle energy.

        - Under the first layer of armor, the most vital parts of the ship (command and information center, ammunition magazine(s), energy generation, engine and warp drive) benefit from a second layer of defense -- a pair of two 35-cm thick layers of reflective titanium armor, separated by the ship`s mercury tanks, protect these parts against more energetic projectiles.  They are complemented on the sides by the two 50KL mercury tanks which, thanks to the high density of their content, can act as a layer of liquid armor.�css
    The ship can fulfill a diverse set of missions: 
        - Combat, Escort, Harassment and Patrol missions: these are the main applications for the Kayan-Class Corvette.  A group of Kayans can form a pack and take down enemy ships larger than themselves with their missiles.  Its turreted laser, self defense missiles, and cannon are also very effective against smaller targets, allowing it to destroy enemy fighters and missiles, effectively adding itself to the point defense grid of a larger ship.  The ship`s autonomy, along with the rotating crew of six, allows the Kayan to function continuously and perform guard or anti-piracy missions alone.

        - Reconnaissance missions: the Kayan can use its powerful sensor suite, autonomy, small cross section, and stealth oriented-design to detect and report enemy activities.  

        - Finally, Strategic Deterrence missions: the corvette can use its warp drive and large VLS tubes to deliver up to eight nuclear-tipped missiles far into enemy territory. 


    The corvette represents the backbone of the [!4 Neo Urran] Fleet where it numbers in the thousands to hundreds of thousands.  The ship is the product of the Imperial Urran Naval doctrine of relying on a large number of small, mobile, and expendable spacecrafts in order to overwhelm an enemy defenses, and denying them any target of significant size.  Type-A kayans can also be found in New Tyventia, but due to celesse centered-production for models of the Kayan, the New Tyventian state only has a few hundred Kayans, and need to cannibalise some of them for spare parts.  The main combat action of the kayan class was during [!5 The battle of Armalai], where they were, along with the nero fighter, at the core of the Urran task force.  But despite an impressive performance from the class, the Urran fleet was outnumbered and outgunned by the full might of the gcp which had been given the Urran battle plan through Itascus.�css
    The ship entered its design phase in 93, and was supposed to be a heavier ship to complement the nero fighters and take on bigger ships in packs.  It entered production in 97, and by 102, a few dozen thousand had been produced.  After the [!5 Battle of Armalai], Larger Urran ships were produced and the role of the Kayan shifted more toward point defense and recon.

    The Kayan Corvette is assembled in orbit of Kosh and [!6 planet Kayan], where the hull, which has been casted in two parts (front and aft), is outfitted with the interior walls and components.  Then, the two parts are cold-welded together.  Once the hull has been found to be airtight, the turrets are mounted and tested.  The subsystems of the craft are then tested. the ship receives a unique identification number made of six base36 characters (0-9 and A-Z, ex: "KZ3E4F") and are assigned to a crew which has the right to name it.  The parts for the Kayan are mostly sourced from the [!7 Celesse system], in order to mitigate the risk of enemy raids on production facilities.  The biggest contractors work in close cooperation with the state and are [!8 Celesse Shipyards], [!9 Kinetyx], [!1 Ganoder], [!10 Urran Life Support Systems Company] and [!11 Vella Optics].  This centralisation has also prevented New Tyventia from building new kayan class ships.�css
    Changelog(by year): 
        103 - The Kayan Type-B model entered production, where the ventral cannon of the Kayan had been replaced with a 10MW laser, and a third Ichor reactor has been added, replacing the magazine below the turret.  Due to these changes, the Kayan Type-B cost the equivalent of 1.045 Billion Kars ($209 Million ITC) while the Kayan Type-A only cost 880 million ($176 million ITC).  Today, the Kayan Type-B is the most prevalent form of the craft, while the Type-A is mostly restricted to larger battlegroups.

        104 - The titanium armor on all Neo-Urran Kayans was replaced by an equivalent volume of graphene-reinforced titanium-aluminium alloy.  The resulting armor is stronger but only has 80% of the original volumic mass. 

        The outermost layer of titanium was replaced by a layer of copper of the same weight, coated in graphene sheets of approximately 1m^2 each, produced by the deposition of a carbon-rich vapor on a copper substrate.  While reducing the resistance of the ship to kinetic impacts, it also greatly enhances its resistance to lasers. Due to the extremely high thermal conductivity of graphene, the heat is drawn away from the impact point and mitigates local vaporization of the armor. The heat is then transferred from the graphene layer to the copper layer due to the high conductivity of copper. The result is a layer of armor which only fails when the whole block of copper reaches 2200C, which is the temperature of disintegration of the covalent bonds in graphene.



The following information is valid for a Year 103 Type-B Kayan.�css

pages.name: Ganoder Computer Company
pages.data:
css
┌────────────────────────────────┐
│Active Period.:84-Present       │
│Field.........:Computer science │
│Open Stocks?..:No               │
│Base..........:[!1 Kosh]        │
│Net Worth.....:$48 Billion      │
└────────────────────────────────┘


    Ganoder is a [!2 Neo Urran] computer manufacturer based on Kosh.  Since the [!3 Battle of Armalai], the company has mostly specialised in military hardware and software but is also producing computers for civilian use.

    By being on Kosh, Ganoder has been able to participate in the Urran [!4 Post-Armalai Fleet Modernisation Program].  This program was like giving bread to the company, which was awarded the production of the computer systems in the [!5 Kayan], [!6 Armalai] and [!7 Karmine] classes of ships, along with the guidance system of the [!8 C61 shell].

    The company was founded by Erwin Ganoder in 84 PW and was, at the time, a small engineering bureau.  In 95 PW, they were given an envelope of 15 million Kars (equivalent to 3 million dollars [!9 ITC]) to design a factory for the production of embedded systems for the [!4 Kayan class] ship.  Later, he was given a second package of 10 billion Kars (2 billion dollars [!9 ITC]) to build and operate it.  The transformation was successful, and in 102, the company won the bid for building the computers of the new [!6 Armalai] and [!7 Karmine] classes of combat ship, along with a deal with [!10 Kinetyx] for the guidance system of the C61.  In 105, the company had launched its first line of civilian computers, the G1, which was a commercial success accross the Urran empire.

pages.name: Coefficient Node Matrix
pages.data:
css
    A Coefficient Node Matrix (CNM) is a type of algorithm/data model which can effectively self-generate.  It is used in domains where traditional expert software development produces unreliable results or isn’t deemed cost effective.  Coefficient Node Matrixes, when used to make problem-solving AI, are called "Generated Intelligences".

    This is why the technology is so useful; when a problem is too big or too complex for a human to design a solution to, a node matrix can mutate itself into a solution for the problem instead.  The largest biggest users of these matrices are search engines, speech or software designed to recognise speech, images, handwritten text or other patterns and the autopilots of various vehicles because of the complexity of these kinds of algorithm.    

    In more brief terms, an initial, empty matrix acts as a blank template from which a specific algorithm can evolve.  Though this evolution, one can generate a novel solution to a particular problem without human design.  This matrix can be understood as a network of variables, the “nodes” linked together in layers by mathematical functions called “lines”.  Since CNMs are similar in function to biological brains, "nodes" and "lines" are sometimes called "neurons" and "axons" respectively.�css
    The input data is fed into the neurons of the first layer, then each subsequent layer transforms the input data by multiplying it with parameters and adding biases before sending it to the next. the output can then be read in the neurons of the last layer.  The last layer is the output of the matrix, and is what outputs generated material, commands to hardware, or the answer to the question asked of the CNM.  These networks are generally very resource-intensive due to the sheer amount of calculations required between neurons.  These processes are almost exclusively sped up using special chips, where the nodes and paths are physically on the circuitry, requiring much less computing power than simulating each component on a processor.

    This whole matrix can be seen as a singular, huge mathematical function, with thousands of parameters which transform the input layer into the output layers.  But in order to solve a problem, the CNM must first be trained.  In order to train a CNM, you require a data set which contains a collection of parameters to be fed into the CNM, as well as the answer key for each group of parameters.  Ex: if you wanted to train a CNM to differentiate between images of space ships and airplanes, you data set should contain many images of both spaceships and airplanes, with each image being tagged with the answer as to whether it's a ship or a plane.  The larger and more diverse your data set, the more accurate and versatile your network will be at the end of training.�css
    The parameters to be input into these networks can mainly be found in two ways, Supervised Learning or Unsupervised Learning.
    In Supervised Learning, we feed the matrix with example data; for each example, the weights and biases of the matrix are tweaked in order to make it provide a more correct answer.  The network can then be tested with new examples to see if the tweaks made the system more accurate.  If so, the changes are kept, and the process repeats.  This specific process of Supervised Learning is called "Mutation".

    Unsupervised Learning is a lot like Supervised Learning, but instead of one instance of a CNM network, you have several in a group called a "set".  In every iteration of the set, some number of the most fit (as in the best) CNM configurations are kept while the rest are culled.  The vacant slots are then filled with mutations of the remaining configurations.  This cycle is repeated until the fitness of the strongest matrix is above a certain threshold.  Unsupervised Learning tends to give greater yields than Supervised Learning, but requires orders of magnitude more processing power.

    If a large collection of example data is unavailable, the matrix can be set up with a genetic algorithm made by humans.  The data scientist generates several matrices with random coefficients and then makes them compete on the problem.  The best performing matrices are then mutated (weights and biases in the nodes are randomly adjusted) and the removed matrices are replaced by new matrices stemming from the surviving ones.  After each generation, the matrices will have become more efficient at solving the problem.

pages.name: Neo Nastimye
pages.data:
css
┌──────────────────────────────┐
│Radius.........: 7207km       │
│Atm. Rating....: D+           │
│Atm. Height....: 76km         │
│Atm. Pressure..: 1.32atm      │
│Surf. Gravity..: 1.2G         │
│Hydrosphere....: Water,11%    │
│Precipitation..: 210cm/y      │
│Obliquity......: 27.4°        │
│Average Temp...: 324K         │
│Rotation Period: 0.82Yr       │
│Orbital Period.: 0.82Yr       │
│Population.....: 860K         │
│Majority Race..: Tyvant       │
│Allegiance.....: Neo Tyventia │
└──────────────────────────────┘

    Neo Nastimye is a tidally-locked [!1 Neo Tyventian] colony in the Terrene system, founded in 84 by refugees fleeing the [!2 Urran Empire].  The colony is known for its strong Tyvent identity and culture of democracy.  As of 109PW, the colony counted 860 thousand citizens, mostly concentrated in a narrow strip of land around the terminator of the planet.

    Due to the tidal locking, the colonists don’t experience a natural daylight cycle, living in an eternal dawn instead.  Across most of the planet, they use artificial lighting to simulate one.  Emulating a daylight cycle is an important task for colonies on inhospitable tidally-locked worlds, as it helps maintain the health and work ethic of the colonists.�css
    The hemisphere of the planet facing the sun is mostly composed of huge, lifeless, scorched deserts of sand and stone, while the one facing away hosts an equally-lifeless frozen ocean.  Living on Neo Nastimye is especially hard due to the constant, unforgiving winds that careen over the surface at over 200 kilometers per hour.  These winds are caused by the atmosphere condensing on the cold face of the planet, then flowing to the hot side to evaporate.  This causes a constant, strong flow of wind from the warm side to the cold side, and a constant flow of freezing atmospheric gasses from the cold side to the warm.  Ships can only land or take off during very short windows where the windspeed drops under 40 kilometers per hour.  While this is a challenge for colonizing, it's a also a challenge to invade, which was a draw for initial colonists who were fearful of an attack from the [!2 Urran Empire].

    The colonists mostly live indoors, in small underground communities where they do their agriculture.  Due to the lack of exports, the small size of the local market, and the isolation of the colony, it is poorer than the average world in the Silver Stream.  The majority of the planet's power comes from wind turbines, which are numerous and fruitful.

pages.name: Gearthmeiaism Summary
pages.data:
css
    Modern gallean religion is mostly consolidated under the term "Gearthmeiaism".  Unlike Ancient Gallean Religions, the modern variant is more consolidated in their beliefs thanks to the Great Prophet, [!1 Kermak Ferni Emero] of the Ferni tribe.  Although records are hard to find exact dates for, he is thought to have been born 100-120 years before the [!2 Gallean World War]. 
    Gaerthmeiaism is the most widely believed in religion for all Galleans, inside and out of the Gallean government’s territory. 

    Gearthmeiaism varies from ancient Gallean Religions in few distinct areas, where ancient religious ideas held volcano gods as being born onto the surface, modern religious beliefs hold that they were born in the Great Warmth of The Holy Core and sacrifice themselves in battle with the Cold gods’ to give Galleats warmth --  fighting the corruption forces of the cold on the surface, and giving Galleans a fighting chance.

    There are religious minorities that oppose Gearthmeiaism, and while the Gallen Republic maintains a separation of church and state, meaning no direct legal enforcement of Gearthmeiaism, the Gallean social order is heavily biased to Gearthmeiaism.  Social enforcement of Gearthmeian values is baked into the culture of most Gallean governments.

pages.name: The Kermak Enlightenment
pages.data:
css
    Pre-Kermak Enlightenment, religions were wildly diverse across [!1 Gallea]; it could change from one town to the next, or remain contiguous over entire primitive nations.  There were a few common elements, however: the belief in Volcano deitism, the evil of the Cold, the Righteous Heat, and the Dying of heat into the cold through time as an eternal cycle.  The specifics were disputed for millenia, and in some religions, the Cold was either a neutral, all-encompassing death that all things faded into; or a revenge driven, vengeful monster that consumes life with prejudice. 
 
    Kermak was born into one of the old kingdoms of Gallea in the year -103.  As a young boy, he worked and toiled in the underground farms of [!2 Venisuo].  As a laborer, he would struggle every day to make ends meet, and, from the sources we have, we know he was deeply religious both on and off the fields.  It is important to note that the Gallean Industrial Revolution was happening at the time, and laborers from the new factories and the farms were becoming increasingly socialist in their ideas.  With the Social change around him, Kermak was said to have become more socialist himself.

    Around the time he was 13, the Galleat donated all of his possessions, and begin travelling the world.  This sudden change of lifestyle was spurred on by a vision he experienced at the large dormant Volcano that stood high over the eastern edge of Venisuo.  The vision is said to be the sight of the great old Volcano’s deity directing Kermak himself to bring together the world’s religions under one single religion, for the volcano’s deity is Gearthmeia the father of all volcano deities that bring the Great Warmth to the surface in the never ending cycle of heat and the battle against the dying of the warmth.�css
    And so began Kermak’s prophetism, after visiting many large cities and small towns, he returned back to Venisuo to found his new religion with 30 Apostles in the Caldera of Gearthmeia in the year -86.  From there, Gearthmeiaism was created and subsequently spread rapidly, while it respected previous traditions of individual tribes (tribes being families and/or large groups that consider each other familial in Gallean society), it also consolidated their beliefs into a single entity, the Church of Gearthmeia.  While more radical tennents like sacrifice of Galleans to volcanoes were weened out, sacrifices of food or other items replaced them.  This was part of a larger trend of lessening Gallea's more radical beliefs in turn for more sustainable and ethical ones, referred to by the church as “Realizing Sustainable Faith”. 

    From his church in Venisuo, Kermak was instrumental in the enlightenment of many Galleans across the globe into socialist ideals.  This broad enlightenment is thought to be one of the events that led the world into the [!3 Gallean World War].  The Gallean Republic subsequently formed, and was generally founded on some of Gearthmeiaism’s tennents.  Kermak died in Venisuo in -66 of heart failure, surrounded by his apostles.

pages.name: Church Structure
pages.data:
css
    The Church of Gearthmeia, at its lowest level, consists of small, local churches in settlments, [!1 space stations], and even large spacecraft, each manned by a clergy of local Calorum.  Calorum, meaning Priest of Heat, is the word used to describe any priest of Gearthmeiaism.  On the level above local churches is a Regional Rhurch, usually in the most populous, prosperous, or most holy settlement/location in the region, or on heavily-populated/trafficked [!2 astroports].  Regional churches are manned by a council of Calorum tasked with dealing with religious affairs over an entire region.  The subsequent step up after regional churches is the Planetary Church, usually having extended power over an entire star system if the planet in question is the [!3 primary world] in the system.  Planetary churches are manned by special priests called Caelesti Calorum, who are led by a single High Caelesti Calorum, elected by all Calorum in the planet/system every five [!4 galactic years].  High Caelesti Calorum answer to Sector Estecaloum, religiously ruling from a sector church.
    The final rung of the church hierarchy is the High Church in [!5 Venisuo], built in the Caldera of Gearthmeia.  It is a sprawling campus of faithful and religious knowledge.  In the center lies the main Chapel building where a Council of Gearth Estecaloum and a Kermakari rule the religious affairs for the entirety of the Gearthmeian religion.  The Kermakari is an elected official, with an election held every decade in which only Calorum may vote.  The Kermakari appoints sector Estecaloum and sets policy for the church.

pages.name: Names for Colonized Worlds
pages.data:
css
    There are three common names for inhabited worlds.  These are "Primary", "Secondary", and "Frontier" worlds.  These terms are not very strictly-defined, and are mainly just used for summarizing a planet's inhabitance.

    Primary Worlds are large, developed population centers.  An inhabited world is typically considered a Primary World when its population exceeds hundreds of millions to a billion, and less than about 15% of the population lives below the poverty line.  All Homeworlds (meaning a world where a species of human originated from) are considered Primary Worlds.
    Secondary Worlds are worlds that are less populated or less developed than primary worlds, but still have a considerable amount of infrastructure and population.  They usually have 20 to 500 million inhabitants, and basic infrastructure like transit, power, and water.  Secondary worlds are about 8 times as numerous as Primary ones.
    Frontier Worlds are worlds with very minimal inhabitance.  These worlds have less than a million inhabitants, and are typically only in place for mining operations.  These worlds are sometimes even abandoned after mining facilities close, losing up to 95% of their inhabitants to emmigration.  Frontier Worlds typically do not even have a breathable atmosphere.  The majority of inhabited worlds are Frontier Worlds.  Frontier and Secondary Worlds are sometimes called "Backwater Worlds", though this name is typically derogatory.

pages.name: Gearthmeiain Beliefs
pages.data:
css
    [!1] +Lifestyle
    [!2] +Creation Myth
    [!3] +The Gift of Warmth
    [!4] +Afterlife
    [!5] +Science and Religion

pages.name: Gearthmeiain Lifestyle
pages.data:
css
    The ideal lifestyle is not to commit sins.  To live a life free of sin, one must be mostly selfless, act in the good of others, sacrifice food or possessions to a volcano god within the last year, and to live a meaningful life to yourself and those around you.  The specifics of the lifestyle are deeply related to socialist ideas; everyone should contribute to the welfare of others (ex: gifts or donations to the less fortunate).
    For devout Gaerthmeians who don`t have access to a volcano (if they live a long distance from one, or even on a planet with no active volcanoes), courier services have popped up specifically for shipping items to active volcanoes for purposes of sacrifice.

    Sins are considered to be acts of selfishness (acts which hurt others), greed, lust, adultery, and envy.  These are considered to be offenses to the Volcano gods who sacrificed themselves for the Galleans to be free from the all-encompassing cold.  Outsiders and capitalist-leaning religious minorities can get shamed for expressing greed, and some faithful Gaerthmeians may attempt to convert them, or at least change the ways of the offender to save them from the Cold.

pages.name: Afterlife
pages.data:
css
    If a Galleat has used his life to help others, has sacrificed to the Volcano gods, overall lived a meaningful existence, and has repented their sins, their body must go through a ritualistic sacrifice into a Volcano, known as The Unanchoring.  This is seen as a way of destroying the mortal coil and releasing the soul to travel into the Great Warmth of the Holy Core.  From there, they will live in paradise. 

    If However, it is deemed by the local church that they have not lived right or committed sin without repentance or seeking forgiveness, their body will be buried in ice, for their life succumbed to the cold, and their soul shall be trapped in the cold forever.  Their souls will forever be tormented by the cold lived through their life.

pages.name: The Gift of Warmth
pages.data:
css
    The Gift of Warmth is a central religious tenet of Gearthmeiaism.  The Gift of Warmth is: ‘As Gearthmeia sacrificed himself to give Galleans a second chance and opportunity to live fulfilling lives, it is an insult and tragedy to not fulfill his wish, any who have lived in sin must be granted a second chance to improve themselves, and everyone must live fulfilling lives to truly accept the gift of Warmth inside of us all.  The cold inside of us is in a constant battle with the warmth, never give in to the cold’-Kermak’s own inscription into a wall within the High Church.
    
    Other, more specific beliefs related to the Gift of Warmth:
        Every sun is a goddess whom channels their power from the Warm One.
        The Cold One created the Cold Gods to enforce his all-encompassing cold and tempt creatures to sin.
        Volcano gods only truly die when the Holy Core beneath them dies, they die/rest only in physical form.
        Desert planets are seen as battlegrounds of the holy and unholy, with hot days and cold nights, while most believers would worship from afar due to the physiology of Galleans not allowing for much survival, some pilgrims dare to try and survive on the surface.

pages.name: Creation Myth
pages.data:
css
    The beginning was empty and frozen.  There was no warmth until, out of nowhere and suddenly, a great burst of energy spread Warmth into the universe, through its warmth, it battled with the all encompassing cold.  From it the greatest god of all was born, the god of Warmth, the One who’s name can burn the tongue.  In the cold another god formed to balance the Warm one, The Cold one.  In their battles, the Cold one and the Warm one created the universe.  Each sun and star is a bastion and conduit of the Warm one.  One of the stars made was Gavia, the embodiment of the Sun Goddess Gavia(created by the Warm one and channels his power), spreading her warmth to the planets of her system.  Gavia infused into the planet Gallea a Holy Core. 
    
    The Holy Core is a conduit of Gavia and subsequently a conduit to the Warm one himself.  The Holy Core forged a new species of pure warmth, Galleans.  Also from the Holy Core came the Volcano gods, they forged themselves the council of warmth in the core.  They lived selfless and prosperous lives.  However, The Cold one was watching Gavia as she infused the planet with her Holy Warmth, planning and scheming from afar.  One day, he came down to the planet and froze it’s surface, corrupting Galleans with cold and sin. 
    
    Gearthmeia saw the plight of Galleans, corrupted by the Cold one, his fellow brothers and sisters, children of Gavia, and children of the Warm one.  From his sight, he could not bear to see them destroyed so, and so he sacrificed himself to bring warmth to them.  Galleans now both have the Cold and Warmth within them, it’s their choice to embrace either side.

pages.name: Science in Gearthmeiaism
pages.data:
css
    The discovery of [!1 Qi Energy]'s role in biology sent a shockwave through Gearthmeiaism and, in the eyes of believers, confirmed their beliefs in the Great Warmth; given that a body's Qi energy (also called the "Chellum") is its main source of heat, Qi’s properties match up with it near completely, and Qi’s prevalence within beings also confirmed, in their eyes, that their life was given by the Warm One, forged within the heat.  One's Chellum is also seen as that soul since one's soul, in Gearthmeiaism, was made from the Great Warmth and it should return to it. 

    Before Qi discovery, science and religion were ambivalent to one another other on Gallea, not truly combined or separate.  After Qi discovery is when the science & religion of Gallea almost entirely intertwined with each other.  Furthering Science (more specifically, their understanding of the world), in the eyes of Gearthmeiaism, was now the way to truly connect with the Warm One and use the power mandated to them by Gearthmeia as they see fit.  Many scientists are revered by Gallean culture almost like prophets, poking at what the Warm One hath created for them, to understand how it works as they were destined to.  The clergy of Gearthmeiaism interprets the data from scientists almost immediately after new findings arise. 

    The understanding of Qi Energy intertwined religion and science on Gallea, and now believing in Gearthmeia and helping the church is synonymous with furthering science and helping research.  The religious affair of science is a unique one, and holds very high value within Gallean culture.

pages.name: Church Politics
pages.data:
css
    There are currently 4 primary sub-factions within the church; the Conservatives, which take up 46% of church membership; the Sustainability Front, which is 40%; the True Path, which is 11%; and Followers of the Warm One’s Embrace, which is ~3%.  These four factions have are the result of a recent push among believers to question if the church is on the right path for the future.  This new movement has been partially spurred on by the religious integration of science, which allowed for the ideas of rationalism and secularism to become more widespread. 

    The Conservatives believe that the church is on the right path as it is now.  The church, to them, is fine as it is, and does not need to be modified.  Ritual sacrifices aren’t too burdensome, and not so small as to disrespect the sacrifice of volcano gods and the Warm One. 
    
    The Sustainability Front argues that the sacrifices and obligations of the church are too burdensome, ultimately unneeded, and isn't a requirement for a soul to be embraced by the Great Warmth.  This faction believes less in the mystical side of Gearthmeian culture, taking a more realist approach.  However, they still believe in socialist values and maintaining of the current Gearthmeian [!1 lifestyle], however the ritual sacrifices are needless burdens, are unsustainable, and, if uncorrected, will draw too many away from the faith.�css
    The True Path faction believes that, while Kermak was right for his time, in the era of space commercialism, it is the best path for the culture to become more capitalist (and less socialist).  It is an individual's fault if they do not fulfil the gift of warmth.  They also believe that Gearthmeia would have wanted us to use his gift without needing to be repaid, allowing Galleans to reach their full potential.  They believe fundamentally changing the faith is necessary, and is the true path that Gearthmeiaism must take for the future. 
    
    Warm One’s Embrace is by far the most objectively radical faction of the four; they believe that Galleans must sacrifice other Galleans to the Volcano gods in order to be embraced in the Great Warmth.  It is only proper to sacrifice everything to the Warm One.  The members of this faction range from monks with zero possessions in a commune that sacrifices members, to radical terrorists that believe all Galleans must die through heat.  Proclaiming alliegence to this faction can lead to someone being put on a list of potential security threats by the [!2 Gallean Government].

pages.name: Nero Fighter
pages.data: [Unwritten]

pages.name: Antaria-Class Turret
pages.data:
css
┌─────────────────────────────────────┐
│Use Period........: 95-Present       │
│Weight............: 12,100Kg         │
│Caliber...........: 100mm*600mm      │
│Shots/15 seconds..: 50               │
│Dispersion at 1km.: ±5m(.286deg)     │
│Accuracy Rating...: 5                │
│Muzzle Energy.....: 180MJ            │
│Damage Rating.....: 3                │
│Damage Type.......: Ballistic        │
│Manufacturer......: Celesse Shipyards│
└─────────────────────────────────────┘

    The Antaria is a turret equipped on the [!1 Kayan-Class Corvette].  It has an elevation speed of 70 degrees per second and a traverse speed of 120 degrees per second.  The turret's chassis is protected by half a meter of titanium armor and rotated by a 100kw motor.  The cannon's elevation is controlled by an additional 50kw motor in the hull of the turret.  The mounted weapon can elevate from -15 to 85 degrees, which allows for overlapping cones of fire.  Two versions of the turret exist: the Antaria B and the Antaria L.  The Antaria B is equipped with a 100mm Electrothermal Chemical Cannon (abbreviated as an "ETC Cannon") while the Antaria L is equipped with a 10MW laser.  

    The Antaria B can fire two types of rounds at a time due to a duplicate-feeding mechanism -- the rounds come from the magazine on two separate belts, and are then fed into the cannon at the demand of the operator, which can seamlessly alternate the between the two sources.  This unique capacity allows for high rates of fire or the ability to use the turret both as a ciws and as an offensive weapon.�css
    The Antaria L`s laser is mounted on the same place as the cannon would be on the Antaria B, but the belts are replaced by electric cables, and an additional, supplementary [!2 Ichor Reactor] is often installed in the place of the magazine.  This shared form factor allows for simpler logistics and more flexibility in manufacturing, with the two forms of the Antaria having the ability to be produced with the same tooling and factories.

    The rounds in the Electrothermal Chemical Cannon are electrically-ignited using a plasma cartridge.  This method of ignition allows for the use of more energetically-dense propellants (cyclotrimethylenetrinitramine, for example, in the case of the [!1 Kayan]) which can achieve exit velocities of up to 3.2km/s, and improve the predictability of the detonation of the propellant inside the barrel.  The ETC Cannon system also improves the survivability of the ship by preventing internal magazine explosions; if the magazine is hit during combat, an explosion can not detonate the shells because their propellant requires the electrical stimulation of the plasma cartridge in order to explode.

    The most used ammunition for the Antaria on the Kayan is a fragmentation shell, containing 416 2-cm tungsten balls; and a high-explosive filler, detonating after a delay magnetically transmitted to the shell on barrel exit.  This shell, used for CIWS and anti-fighter purposes, is complemented by an APDS (Armor Piercing Discarding Sabot) for harder targets.

    The Antaria turret is named after the capital city of the planet [!3 Kayan], [!4 Antaria].

pages.name: Exospace
pages.data:
css
┌──────────────────────────────┐
│Active Period.: 34-Present    │
│Field.........: Ship-building │
│Open Stocks?..: No            │
│Base..........: [!1 Deoria]   │
│Net Worth.....: $298 Billion  │
└──────────────────────────────┘


    Exospace is a brand making luxurious spaceships for the elites of the [!2 GCP].  Owning an Exospace Yacht is a social symbol of success on many worlds, and has become a life-goal for some people.

    Their catalog is divided into three lines of ships:
        The E-1X series, holding their smallest ships, able to support one or two people on board, they are the cheapest models provided by the company
        The E-2X series, for intermediately-sized ships, designed to support up to ten passengers.
        and The E-3X series, for the most oversized luxury shows, costing up to $3,000,000,000.

    The Headquarters of the company is on the [!3 Molokai Station], a giant shipyard coloured in red and black (which are the colours of the brand).
    
    When Exospace was first established, their marketing was geared towards showcasing the newest facets of space technology, trying to sell their products to consumers interested in the cutting edge of space travel technology.

    In the mid 50s, Exospace changed their marketing scheme from "being a trendy brand proposing the newest gadgets", to a company producing only the finest, most spectacular spacecraft one can find the GCP.  The company uses its age, "Since 34 P.W.", to strengthen its reputation of excellence, practicality, and quality.

pages.name: Gallean Naming Conventions
pages.data:
css
    Common Gallean names have 3 parts, the first being the individual's given name, the second being their [!1 clan] name, and the third being the name of their parent of the same sex.  In that order, the names are arranged.  IE; Kermak Fermi Anori.  `Kermak` being the individual's name, `Fermi` his clan, and `Anori` the name of his father.
    On Official documents, names follow this structure.

    Gallean Clan Names can be best described as the 'family name' and, in formal ceremonies, only the First Name and Clan Name are referenced.  For example, a Gallean named Kermak Fermi Anori would just be refered to as "Kermak Fermi" at ceremonies.
    
    During clan events, such as reunions or head-of-clan elections, the last name is used in place of clan names when referring to a person.  IE: Kermak son of Anori.  This is to prevent confusion among clan members as almost everyone in attendance is from the same clan.  Galleans may change their clan names through marriage.  If a married couple chooses not to have a shared clan name, their offspring will keep the clan name of their parent of the same gender. 

    The gallean naming structure was standardized after the [!2 Gallean World War] in the year -40.  Before the war, multiple, various naming structures existed which, which had led to clashing international paperwork.  Due to its required use for over a century, 76% of the [!3 Gallean] population uses this naming structure for both official and personal affairs.

pages.name: Nexus Hosting Corporation
pages.data:
css
┌──────────────────────────────┐
│Active Period.: 56-Present    │
│Field.........: Server Hosting│
│Open Stocks?..: Yes           │
│Base..........: [!1 Gallea]   │
│Net Worth.....: $4.6 trillion │
└──────────────────────────────┘


    The Nexus Hosting Corporation is a partly-state-owned enterprise which hosts many of the websites that make up the [!2 GCP]-wide internet, as well as hosting other internet-centered services.  It rents usage of it’s servers out for a profit to governments, corporations, and individuals.  While it does provide basic encryption and protection from threats, the company has a notable subsidiary -- Nexus Server Security -- which sells higher-level encryption and protection services for clients. 

    Due to the naturally freezing temperatures of [!1 Gallea], as well as the vast tech industry presence on the planet, Gallea was the perfect place to base vast Server farms with little cost put into the cooling infrastructure.  Many server farms pull in cold air or radiate heat directly into the cold ice of the surface, leading to a reduced cost of cooling, which means a lower price charged to the end consumer.  It’s direct connection to other GCP worlds by [!3 Quantum node] infrastructure means that it has fewer interruptions over interplanetary connections than other competing services.�css
    Founded in the year 56 as a joint private and public venture, Nexus Hosting has always had an uncommon advantage over most other hosting companies due to lowered cooling cost.  Nexus Hosting’s founding came as a government mandate, seeing the new internet begin to rapidly spread in the GCP, the government felt it needed to be on the forefront of the new technology and communications wave, and secure a place of strength.  With it’s direct use of government infrastructure at no cost and start-up capital provided directly from the government, it was able to rapidly buy out other small hosting firms that were just starting up.  Nexus Hosting has a near total monopoly on Gallea and Gallean colonies while commending a significant market share of hosting for foreign governments and corporations across the GCP. 

    It is not hidden that the Gallean Government exclusively uses Nexus Hosting for data services, and even runs its most sensitive files through its servers.  The Gallean military uses Nexus Hosting servers through its command ships and relay stations. 

    Due to the company being partly state-owned, 35% of shares are permanently owned by the Gallean State Government and 50% of all profit the company makes goes directly towards state funds.  The rest of the profit stays within the company, or goes to the private portion of the corporation’s leadership.

pages.name: Gallean Reconstruction Program
pages.data:
css
    Predecessor to the current [!1 Gallean Social Uplift Program], the Gallean Reconstruction Program (referred to as "GRP") was initiated the year after the conclusion of the [!2 Gallean World War] by the fledgling Gallean Republic.  It would last until the year -20 when it would be reinstated as the Gallean Social Uplift Program. 

    In the wake of the [!2 Gallean World War], the planet was devastated, few areas of the surface weren’t scarred by artillery or carpet bombs.  A few small enclaves of industry remained, notably one near the current Capital, [!3 Heralius], and it was from these places that [!4 Gallea] would begin its reconstruction.  With the new world government beginning to properly stabilize itself, the military budgets that once exceeded 30% of an individual nation’s GDP on average, dropped to 2% for the new government.  All that cashflow would now fall under the GRP’s budget. 

    For the first two years, the program rebuilt factories in the enclaves of industry that were damaged by the war, and began expanding on those that were still standing, done in order to expand the domestic industrial capacity.  Contrary to some of the fears, perpetuated by the losing side of the war, the new government did not nationalize most of the industry, but did subsidize companies that improved efficiency and provided quality work during the run of the program.�css
    After the first two years, the project's focus was shifted towards the infrastructure of essentials: roads, water, food, power, and temporary housing.  This phase would last until the reinstatement of the program in -20 P.W..  Local businesses and corporations were given contracts for road construction, with their work being overseen by meticulous GRP inspectors.  One of the few beneficial outcomes of the war was that many sectors had a "clean slate", allowing for more efficient infrastructure as opposed to relying on the outdated/obsolete infrastructure that had been destroyed through the war.  The Energy Industry was the only industry to get truly nationalized, though only partly; the distribution of energy was controlled by the state, however privately-owned power plants could exist and get paid by the state based on the amount of energy demand they could satisfy. 
    Railroads were constructed with a similar mix of private and public cooperation, where businesses would aquire government contracts to build the railroads with GRP oversight; train companies were subsidized to expand their routes onto new lines. 

    As a result of all these new companies getting government funding (meant to keep expanding and rebuilding with efficiency in mind), many new jobs for those left unemployed and hungry by the war opened up to support the new projects.  These new jobs allowed workers to afford some luxuries and consumer goods, stimulating local and regional economies.�css
    A core component of the GRP was the quick construction of small, temporary homes for those who lost their shelter and livelihoods from the war.  They were built in complexes known as Warm Homes, constructed around a central building where the complex administration would find residents work, or in many cases would provide new, state-run education to previously-poorly-educated Galleats.  Many of these complexes have been demolished for newer buildings but a few still exist and have been designated National Heritage Sites which can be visited even today.  The homes themselves were not much better than those in the average slum, but they were cheap, and all of the essentials were provided at a fraction of the cost of a typical pre-war apartment.

    The doctrine for the investments was, at first, to connect all the major cities to the industrial enclaves.  From there, infrastructure was built back to pre-war levels.  After inner city roads and power were restored, rails and roads were extended like webs over [!4 Gallea’s] surface and under it’s ice.  The road and rail lines had electrical infrastructure built into them, giving previously-dark rural agricultural areas electricity.  This allowed for extended expansion and mechinization of agrigulture.  As the basic infrastructure was finished, the Warm Homes were constructed and industry was rebuilt.  Infrastructure focus then switched from expansion to maintaining and updating what had already been built, and the freed up capital was then spent specifically targeting low development areas and systematically subsidizing and stimulating local economies.

pages.name: Tyventian Food
pages.data:
css
    [!1] +Tyventian Noodles

pages.name: Tyventian Noodles
pages.data:
css
┌──────────────────────────────────────┐
│Planet of Origin.: Kayan              │
│Time Period......: Prehistoric-Present│
│Ingredients......: Noodles, water,    │
│                   vegetables, eggs,  │
│                   meat, sauces,      │
│                   spices             │
│Preparation Needs: Heat               │
└──────────────────────────────────────┘

    Tyventian noodle soup is a family of traditional noodle soup dishes originating from [!1 Kayan].  Customarily, most Tyventian noodle soups are spicy and slightly sweet, while the noodles themselves are chewy and toothsome, deeply-flavored from having been cooked in broth.  Tyventian noodles are popular throughout New Tyventia and Neo Urra, alongside several ethnic enclaves within other nations.

    Noodles are a staple food for the majority of the [!2 Tyvant] population, especially for the working class, who find noodle soup to be easy to prepare and applicable to any palette.  This dish is usually consumed in the evening as dinner: the broth, if made from scratch, is started on in the morning, simmers throughout the day, and is ready for use in a noodle soup recipe by dusk.  The usual accompaniment for Tyventian noodle soups is a green salad, most popularly Tyventian Mint Salad.

    To prepare this dish, vegetables, pieces of meat, boiled eggs, herbs, spices, sauces, et cetera, are added to a simmering broth, followed by the noodles some time after.  Once everything has cooked, the dish is ready to be served.

    Historical evidence shows that noodle soup has been consumed on Kayan ever since grains were first milled into flour.  As time went by, the soup began to increase in complexity, with new seasonings and flavors being added as trade caused ingredients to be diffused across Kayan.  Now, modern Tyventian Noodle Soup has hundreds of different variants, each made to cater to a specific palette.
